title: My friends game freezes... can someone help?
body:
Okay, so one of my friends is having a problem where they get into a game of League and they cannot do anything. 
No escaping out. 
no control-alt-delete. 
Nothing works except for turning off his computer.
As far as I can tell it only crashes and freezes when he gets into a game not at the launcher.
 His name is xXEmeraldQuillXx.

replies.body: Have you recently updated Windows 10?  There was an issue with the xbox game bar that's been causing some players to freeze.  Disabling the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) should fix this up.  Let me know if you still have any issues!

He said the Xbox game bar was already disabled.

Also Rioter Senpai noticed us!{{item:2054}}

Thanks for the update!  If he's still have issues have him send a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help him individually.  We'll respond to his ticket asap!  
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

I had the same problem with the new Windows 10 update!

if you right click the League application and select "Test Compatibility" it will run a diagnostic and fix the problem for you!

:)
He said he was about to try it and then his girlfriend came over so he's going to try it later.
